mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS VALUES ( seq_comments.nextVal, #{user_id}, #{comments_text}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd am hh24:mi'), #{feed_idx}, #{comments_refNum}, #{comments_div} )
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENTS.FEED_IDX AS FEED_IDX, COMMENTS.COMMENTS_IDX AS COMMENTS_IDX, PROFILE.PROFILE_IMAGE AS PROFILE_IMAGE, COMMENTS.USER_ID AS USER_ID, COMMENTS.COMMENTS_TEXT AS COMMENTS_TEXT, COMMENTS.COMMENTS_REGIDATE AS COMMENTS_REGIDATE, COMMENTS.COMMENTS_DIV AS COMMENTS_DIV FROM FEED, PROFILE, COMMENTS WHERE FEED.FEED_IDX = #{feed_idx} AND COMMENTS.FEED_IDX = #{feed_idx} AND COMMENTS.USER_ID = PROFILE.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY COMMENTS_IDX
SELECT p.PROFILE_IMAGE, c.* FROM COMMENTS c, PROFILE p WHERE FEED_IDX = #{feed_idx} AND p.MEMBER_ID = c.USER_ID START WITH c.COMMENTS_DIV = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR c.COMMENTS_IDX = c.COMMENTS_REFNUM
